categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Farn Klin was a Jedi Initiate in the Jedi Order who studied the ways of the Force at the Coruscant Jedi Temple during the Clone Wars.

Farn Klin, a Force-sensitive individual of a species, was inducted into the Jedi Order at a young age and began training in the ways of the Force at the Coruscant Jedi Temple, shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars. Stationed at the Temple throughout the war, Klin, joined by fellow student Ran Deezy, attended a gathering of Jedi in a Temple comm station when General Grievous sent a holographic transmission in which the cyborg gloated over his capture and torture of Jedi Master Eeth Koth.
